item.title: GSoC 2017 -- A Postmortem
item.description: GSoC 2017 is quickly coming to a close, and I wanted to keep a log of my decisions and changes over the past few months in a single post. This will hopefully serve as a component of my final submission alongside the corresponding mailing-list threads and git commits. For anybody that has not read my previous posts on this blog and wants to learn more about some of the things discussed here, please read those posts and provide me with any feedback you have.
